A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a let down\, i went in with no feelings toward the movie and it still was a huuuuuuuge let down\, not just a let down just a terrible star wars film\, i might even say worse then phantom mence. Tons of \"twists\" that r jusy stuiped.  Some new characters who im not saying r bad actors\, but just werent fun or needed or wanted\, they brought nothing to the plot or movie or franchise\, just a \"care about me!\"feel. This movie even got me to not care what happened to any of the old cast. So many scenes that were a waste of time and theres even one plot that makes them go to a planet that doesnt feel like star wars at all. The cloths\, the aliens\, etc everyone on that planet about felt like from a different movie. I could go on and on and on about why i dont like this\, but then i would be just rambling on like this movie did. So go see it\, u have to any way to see the next one. But wow was this bad. (One last thing i like almost all the films\, i even like force awakens\, but this one just angers me so.much\, if u like it thats totally fine\, i hope it was as good for you as i hoped it would of been for me)
